page.title: 15Sarn Bowling Club
page.content: {Sarn Bowling Club}was formed in 1982 by a few people who played mostly for other clubs.A lot of interest was shown by local people.The first year they had in the region of 25 members. In 1984 they had around 50 members. This year it is around 50.In 1984 they played 17 friendly games, of which 11 were won against clubs like Abermule, Churchstoke,Clun,Meifod and a lot of other local clubs.This year there are 18 friendlies but the weather is not very kind and 2 games have been cancelled.There is also a 200 club (200 people pay Â£10 a year,and have their names put into a monthly draw) This is to help raise money for the Bowling Club.
